frame.description: Track security aggregate metrics over time
frame.title: Security Aggregate Metrics Over Time

frame.description: Track security business ratios over time
frame.title: Security KPI Trends

datasets.name: ds_kpi_events
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(*), 0) AS total_events, FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity_email), 0) AS distinct_users FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_high_risk
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS sensitive_action_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_denied
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%denied%' OR action_name LIKE '%error%' OR action_name LIKE '%fail%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS denied_access FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_permissions
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%grant%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' OR action_name LIKE '%permission%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS permission_changes FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_kpi_admin
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS distinct_actions FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_event_trend
datasets.query: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS event_count, COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity_email) AS distinct_users FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_risk_trend
datasets.query: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS high_risk, SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%update%' OR action_name LIKE '%modify%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS medium_risk FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_denied_access
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity_email, action_name, service_name, event_time, source_ip_address AS source_ip FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND action_name LIKE '%denied%' OR action_name LIKE '%error%' OR action_name LIKE '%fail%' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_permission_changes
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity_email, action_name, COALESCE(get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.securable_full_name'), COALESCE(get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.full_name'), get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.name')), 'N/A') AS target_entity, event_time FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND (action_name LIKE '%grant%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' OR action_name LIKE '%permission%') ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_denied_by_service
datasets.query: SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS denial_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND action_name LIKE '%denied%' OR action_name LIKE '%error%' OR action_name LIKE '%fail%' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_denied_by_user
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity_email, COUNT(*) AS denial_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND action_name LIKE '%denied%' OR action_name LIKE '%error%' OR action_name LIKE '%fail%' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_admin_actions
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity_email, action_name, service_name, COALESCE(get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.securable_full_name'), COALESCE(get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.full_name'), get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.name')), 'N/A') AS target_entity, event_time FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND (action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%') ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_sensitive_actions
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity_email, action_name, service_name, event_time FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND (action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%') ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_admin_by_action
datasets.query: SELECT action_name, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND (action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%') GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_data_access
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity_email, action_name, COALESCE(get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.securable_full_name'), COALESCE(get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.full_name'), get_json_object(to_json(request_params), '$.name')), 'N/A') AS target_table, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max AND service_name = 'unityCatalog' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3 ORDER BY 4 DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_access_by_service
datasets.query: SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_access_hourly
datasets.query: SELECT HOUR(event_time) AS hour, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs  WHERE event_time BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_threats
datasets.query: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity_email, 'N/A' AS threat_type, 0.0 AS risk_score, 0.0 AS confidence, CURRENT_DATE() AS prediction_date WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity_email, 'Pending' AS threat_type, 0.0 AS risk_score, 0.0 AS confidence, CURRENT_DATE() AS prediction_date LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_exfiltration
datasets.query: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity_email, 0.0 AS data_volume, 'N/A' AS risk_level, 0.0 AS anomaly_score WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity_email, 0.0 AS data_volume, 'Pending' AS risk_level, 0.0 AS anomaly_score LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_privilege
datasets.query: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity_email, 'N/A' AS current_role, 'N/A' AS escalation_risk, 0.0 AS confidence WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity_email, 'N/A' AS current_role, 'Pending' AS escalation_risk, 0.0 AS confidence LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_monitor_latest
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  ROUND(SUM(total_events), 0) AS total_events,
  ROUND(AVG(distinct_users), 0) AS avg_distinct_users,
  ROUND(AVG(sensitive_action_count), 0) AS avg_high_risk
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table'
AND window.start BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max

datasets.name: ds_monitor_trend
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  DATE(window.start) AS date,
  SUM(total_events) AS total_events,
  SUM(sensitive_action_count) AS sensitive_action_count
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table'
AND window.start BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
GROUP BY DATE(window.start)
ORDER BY date

datasets.name: ds_monitor_access
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  DATE(window.start) AS date,
  SUM(failed_action_count) AS failed_action_count,
  SUM(permission_changes) AS permission_changes
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table'
AND window.start BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
GROUP BY DATE(window.start)
ORDER BY date

datasets.name: ds_monitor_drift
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  DATE(window.start) AS date,
  column_name,
  drift_type,
  ROUND(ks_test.statistic * 100, 2) AS ks_stat_pct
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_drift_metrics
WHERE window.start BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE'
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: ds_monitor_detailed
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  window.end AS window_end,
  column_name,
  ROUND(COALESCE(avg, 0), 2) AS avg_value,
  COALESCE(count, 0) AS record_count
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
WHERE window.start >= :time_range.min
  AND window.end <= :time_range.max
  AND log_type = 'INPUT'
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: ds_time_windows
datasets.query: SELECT 'Last 7 Days' AS time_window UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 30 Days' UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 90 Days' UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 6 Months' UNION ALL SELECT 'Last Year' UNION ALL SELECT 'All Time'

datasets.name: ds_workspaces
datasets.query: SELECT 'All' AS workspace_name UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT workspace_name FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_workspace WHERE workspace_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY workspace_name

datasets.name: select_workspace
datasets.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  COALESCE(workspace_name, CONCAT('id: ', workspace_id)) AS workspace_name
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_workspace 
WHERE workspace_name IS NOT NULL 
ORDER BY workspace_name

datasets.name: select_time_key
datasets.query:
SELECT explode(array(
  'Day',
  'Week',
  'Month',
  'Quarter',
  'Year'
)) AS time_key

datasets.name: ds_select_service
datasets.query: SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE service_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 50

datasets.name: ds_select_action
datasets.query: SELECT DISTINCT action_name FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE action_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 50

datasets.name: ds_monitor_security_aggregate
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  window.end AS window_end,
  total_events,
  distinct_users,
  distinct_actions
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
WHERE window.start >= :monitor_time_start
  AND window.end <= :monitor_time_end
  AND log_type = 'INPUT'
  AND column_name = ':table'
  AND COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') = :monitor_slice_key
  AND COALESCE(slice_value, 'No Slice') = :monitor_slice_value
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: ds_monitor_security_derived
datasets.query:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  window.end AS window_end,
  sensitive_action_rate
FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
WHERE window.start >= :monitor_time_start
  AND window.end <= :monitor_time_end
  AND log_type = 'INPUT'
  AND column_name = ':table'
  AND COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') = :monitor_slice_key
  AND COALESCE(slice_value, 'No Slice') = :monitor_slice_value
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: ds_monitor_security_slice_keys
datasets.query:
WITH profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT slice_key
  FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start >= :monitor_time_start 
    AND window.end <= :monitor_time_end
    AND slice_key IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 'No Slice' AS slice_key
UNION ALL
SELECT slice_key FROM profile_metrics
ORDER BY slice_key

datasets.name: ds_monitor_security_slice_values
datasets.query:
WITH profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT slice_value, COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') AS sk
  FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start >= :monitor_time_start 
    AND window.end <= :monitor_time_end
    AND slice_value IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 'No Slice' AS slice_value
UNION ALL
SELECT slice_value FROM profile_metrics WHERE sk = :monitor_slice_key
ORDER BY slice_value
